description:
Railway network of Namibia
Sources: Atlas : Directorate of Environmental Affairs (DEA), Ministry of Environment & Tourism (MET)
Atlas : digitised by John Mendelsohn from large range of maps of different scales and origins ; Data was adapted for railways within appr. 50 km of coastline :  Digitising on topographic maps 1:50K and 1:250K + orthophotos of Ministry of Lands & Resettlement (MLR)
name: Namibia: Railway system
